name: part_004
file: tmp_【#兎田ぺこら生誕祭2025】生誕3D LIVE！FEVER！！！！！！！ぺこ！【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [uB6GxHc7PRc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Omaru Polka and Usada Pekora perform '闘いの時' (Time of Battle).
Transition scene with slot machine animations and a 'Super Pekora Bonus' sequence.
Ookami Mio joins Usada Pekora to perform 'Synchrogazer'.

subtitles.original: 隙間を開けている 甘えるこの日々
subtitles.english: These pampered days that open up a gap

subtitles.original: 大切な人たちが うつむいても
subtitles.english: Even if the people I cherish look down

subtitles.original: 気付かぬふりをして 心塞ぐのか
subtitles.english: Do I pretend not to notice and close off my heart?

subtitles.original: まだやり直せるかな
subtitles.english: Can I still start over?

subtitles.original: もう一度だけなら
subtitles.english: If it's just one more time...

subtitles.original: 逃げるような生き方は もうやめよう
subtitles.english: Let's stop living as if we're running away

subtitles.original: GET UP GET UP GET UP 闘いの時
subtitles.english: GET UP GET UP GET UP Time to fight

subtitles.original: 脆弱な心のままに
subtitles.english: Just as my fragile heart dictates

subtitles.original: GO THROUGH NIGHT ALL すべてかけて
subtitles.english: GO THROUGH NIGHT ALL Putting everything on the line

subtitles.original: 守るべきものがあるはず
subtitles.english: There must be something worth protecting

subtitles.original: 勝利者の足元で 誰かが泣いてる
subtitles.english: At the feet of the victor, someone is crying

subtitles.original: 勝ち負けを避けれない この日々の中で
subtitles.english: In these days where winning and losing cannot be avoided

subtitles.original: 悔しさを陰口で 零していくような
subtitles.english: Dropping my frustration through backbiting...

subtitles.original: 卑怯な奴には もうなりたくない
subtitles.english: I don't want to be a coward anymore

subtitles.original: まだ間に合うかな
subtitles.english: Is it still in time?

subtitles.original: きっとここなんだろうな
subtitles.english: It must be right here

subtitles.original: 勝ち負けを越えてでも 今立ち上がれ
subtitles.english: Even beyond winning and losing, stand up now

subtitles.original: Yeah Yeah Yeah 闘いの時
subtitles.english: Yeah Yeah Yeah Time to fight

subtitles.original: 脆弱な心のままに
subtitles.english: Just as my fragile heart dictates

subtitles.original: Oh Oh Oh Oh すべてかけて
subtitles.english: Oh Oh Oh Oh Putting everything on the line

subtitles.original: 守るべきものがあるはず
subtitles.english: There must be something worth protecting

subtitles.original: 守るべき人がいるはず
subtitles.english: There must be someone worth protecting

subtitles.original: yeah yeah yeah yeah 覚悟はいいか 脆弱な心を叩け
subtitles.english: Yeah yeah yeah yeah Are you ready? Strike your fragile heart

subtitles.original: OH OH OH OH 君は君を かけてでも立ち上がるんだ
subtitles.english: Oh oh oh oh Even if you put yourself on the line, stand up

subtitles.original: Yeah Yeah Yeah 闘いの時
subtitles.english: Yeah Yeah Yeah Time to fight

subtitles.original: 脆弱な心のままに
subtitles.english: Just as my fragile heart dictates

subtitles.original: Oh Oh Oh Oh すべてかけて
subtitles.english: Oh Oh Oh Oh Putting everything on the line

subtitles.original: 守るべきものがあるはず
subtitles.english: There must be something worth protecting

subtitles.original: 守るべき君がいるはず
subtitles.english: There must be you worth protecting

subtitles.original: 歌っちゃうのだぺこー！
subtitles.english: I'm gonna sing-peko!

subtitles.original: 絶唱
subtitles.english: Crescendo (Zesshou)

subtitles.original: スーパーぺこらBONUS
subtitles.english: Super Pekora Bonus

subtitles.original: Listen to my song...
subtitles.english: Listen to my song...

subtitles.original: 僕の声は聞こえていますか？ Please tell me
subtitles.english: Can you hear my voice? Please tell me

subtitles.original: 答えのない虚構の空目指し Fly far away
subtitles.english: Aiming for the answerless fictional sky, Fly far away

subtitles.original: 言葉じゃ足りないから 僕のすべて受け止めて
subtitles.english: Words are not enough, so please accept everything of me
